data.name: 0000 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm thirsty. Tea please, Mikuru.

data.name: 0001 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Okaay, I'll make some now—

data.name: 0002 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Me toooo—!

data.name: 0003 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Alright, please just wait a moment~

data.name: 0004 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At Haruhi's request, Asahina cheerfully began preparing some tea.

data.name: 0005 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Before I knew it, my little sister had already grown attached to Haruhi.

data.name: 0006 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She imitates every little thing Haruhi does.

data.name: 0007 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's as if she's Haruhi's sidekick or something.

data.name: 0008 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As her older brother, I'm concerned for her future.

data.name: 0009 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to intervene before it causes any long-term damage, but…

data.name: 0010 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huff…

data.name: 0011 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi gave a deep breath after gulping down her hot tea in one go.

data.name: 0013 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For something called "the man-eating class- room," the truth behind it was pretty boring.

data.name: 0014 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's reality for you.

data.name: 0015 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Besides, didn't it sound pretty fishy from the get-go?

data.name: 0016 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …I guess you have a point.

data.name: 0017 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's unusual—hearing you actually agree with me on something.

data.name: 0018 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We heard it from the Computer Society, so I thought it was suspicious from the start.

data.name: 0019 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In that case, I don't see why you got yourself involved in the first place.

data.name: 0020 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You just don't get it, Kyon.

data.name: 0021 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When humans want to hide something big, they cover it up with a pile of small lies.

data.name: 0022 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0023 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Those Computer Society guys are definitely hiding something huge.

data.name: 0024 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can tell.

data.name: 0025 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …But why even would they?

data.name: 0026 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The real unnatural phenomenon surely lies with something else they said.

data.name: 0027 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Wait, just hold on for a second—what gave you that idea?

data.name: 0028 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's too great a stretch to even be called a leap in logic.

data.name: 0029 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But Kyon, isn't it way more interesting that way?

data.name: 0030 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Ah, my bad.

data.name: 0031 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's just the kind of person Haruhi Suzumiya is, after all.

data.name: 0032 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you won't even consider the possibility of it being a misunderstanding on their part?

data.name: 0033 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You'll never reach the truth if you give up that easily!

data.name: 0034 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We won't be packing up and saying our farewells anytime soon then, huh…?

data.name: 0035 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, don't you also want to go home where you can quietly get absorbed in your reading?

data.name: 0037 (391.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's fine.

data.name: 0039 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi—

data.name: 0040 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What's the matter?

data.name: 0041 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about you?

data.name: 0042 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Surely you want to enjoy a summer more befitting of a student?

data.name: 0043 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm sincerely enjoying this summer camp, actually.

data.name: 0044 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …You traitor.

data.name: 0045 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, we're here now, so we might as well try to enjoy ourselves.

data.name: 0046 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I just can't be as easygoing as you.

data.name: 0047 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, I also can't be as unconcerned and detached as Nagato.

data.name: 0048 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I honestly want to run away before the damage gets any worse than it already is…

data.name: 0049 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder if there's a way to make that possible.

data.name: 0050 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While I was considering such perplexing questions…

data.name: 0053 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A knock?

data.name: 0054 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It seems like we have a guest.

data.name: 0055 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But it's the middle of summer vacation, so who would even be…

data.name: 0057 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come in! Who is it?

data.name: 0058 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Yoo-hoo! How're you guys doing, Mikuru, Haru-nyan, and the rest?

data.name: 0059 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is Asahina's classmate… Tsuruya, if I remember correctly.

data.name: 0060 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's friend from "this time period" or whatever.

data.name: 0061 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Tsuruya… What's going on?

data.name: 0063 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Well I was just in the area, and you know—

data.name: 0064 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I heard Mikuru was at school and stuff—I thought, how 'bout I drop on by?

data.name: 0065 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I'm like, jumping in to look after you peeps for a bit—

data.name: 0066 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: So about this summer camp—whatcha actually doing?

data.name: 0067 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You coming up with stories or something?

data.name: 0068 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ah, ghost stories because it's summer? And you need 100 of them?

data.name: 0069 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: A faintly lit candle in a dark room—

data.name: 0070 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: But normally, you can't get through 100 in a single night anyways, right—?

data.name: 0071 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ahahaha—!

data.name: 0072 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As hearty and thrilling as ever. She's a stark contrast to Asahina.

data.name: 0073 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's been a while since I last saw her, but I'm almost completely overwhelmed by her energy.

data.name: 0075 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I see, 100 ghost stories also sounds good.

data.name: 0076 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ugh…

data.name: 0077 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not fair to Tsuruya, but right now I can't help but see her as an uninvited guest.

data.name: 0078 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Anyway, Haruhi bites at interesting stories like a starving beast.

data.name: 0079 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: W-well, since you're here and all, how about having tea with us?

data.name: 0080 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Really? Then I guess I'll get myself comfy.

data.name: 0082 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hellooo—!

data.name: 0083 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Isn't that Kyon's little sis? Unusual place to see you.

data.name: 0084 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Are you playing with everyone today?

data.name: 0085 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Nope, monster hunting!

data.name: 0086 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Hmm?

data.name: 0088 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Not monsters, little sister. We're investigating the truth behind some urban legends.

data.name: 0089 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Urban legends? So you're not doing 100 stories after all?

data.name: 0090 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: To be more specific, we're trying to track down the new seven wonders.

data.name: 0091 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's the 21st century, so we can't keep holding on to the mysteries of previous generations.

data.name: 0092 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's just plain boring!

data.name: 0093 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The seven wonders should change with the times, adapting to suit the needs of each era.

data.name: 0094 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: According to you, that is.

data.name: 0095 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ahahaha—!

data.name: 0096 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You guys are up to something as hysterical as usual, arent'cha?

data.name: 0097 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Most people would feel they're being made fun of upon hearing those words, but…

data.name: 0098 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When this person says it, it doesn't seem to give off that kind of impression.

data.name: 0099 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Rather, it feels like she's enjoying it from the bottom of her heart.

data.name: 0100 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In a certain sense, you could even say she's the same type as Haruhi.

data.name: 0101 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I see. The new seven wonders, huh?

data.name: 0103 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: —And here's your tea, Tsuruya.

data.name: 0104 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ooh! Thankies, Mikuru!

data.name: 0105 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Sure enough, the drink Asahina handed her was a piping hot cup of roasted green tea.

data.name: 0106 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tsuruya was drinking it gleefully.

data.name: 0107 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ah, now I think about it…

data.name: 0108 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: It's not quite a ghost story, but I heard a strange rumor.

data.name: 0110 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We'd love to hear it!

data.name: 0111 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: It's nothing too crazy, so don't get your hopes up, but…

data.name: 0112 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I heard there's a strange girl who's been walking through school since vacation started.

data.name: 0113 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A strange girl?

data.name: 0114 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: If I remember right, she has really long hair…

data.name: 0115 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh yeah, and she seems to wear a hat.

data.name: 0116 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh…

data.name: 0117 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Could it be what I saw when…

data.name: 0118 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: You can't see her face clearly, and when you turn back to have a proper look, she's gone.

data.name: 0119 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Well, that's pretty much the gist of it.

data.name: 0120 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: An unfamiliar girl, huh?

data.name: 0121 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not good. Based on Tsuruya's rumor, that's the same girl I saw, right?

data.name: 0122 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We already know that Haruhi's words and actions could potentially worsen the situation…

data.name: 0123 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …so I really don't want her to find out too much, but at this rate…

data.name: 0124 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm… Not bad, but it feels lacking somehow.

data.name: 0125 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't you have anything that screams "certified ghost story!" a little better?

data.name: 0126 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Fortunately, it doesn't seem to suit Haruhi's taste.

data.name: 0127 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Certified ghost story… hmm…

data.name: 0128 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah, but stuff like the "man-eating classroom—"

data.name: 0129 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Or hearing the sound of a piano from an empty music room—

data.name: 0130 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Or the pool glowing eerily in the middle of the night—

data.name: 0131 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Or your doppelganger coming out of a mirror in the entranceway during the night—

data.name: 0132 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nothing like that.

data.name: 0133 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's all just what we heard from the Computer Society, isn't it?

data.name: 0134 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well of course it's pointless to hear the same story again.

data.name: 0135 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I at least get what you're trying to say…

data.name: 0136 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oooh? Sounds different from the stuff I heard.

data.name: 0137 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I can't believe this school has so many ghost stories—I'll have to give this place an extra star!

data.name: 0138 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't judge the quality of a school based on whether or not it has ghosts…

data.name: 0139 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …thank you very much.

data.name: 0140 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: But if that's the kind of thing you're looking for, I suppose I may know a thing or two.

data.name: 0141 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…

data.name: 0142 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hold on a second.

data.name: 0143 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is our ghost story counter seriously about to increase, even at this stage?

data.name: 0144 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We had just barely thwarted our first, and we're already heading back to square one.

data.name: 0146 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That sounds quite interesting.

data.name: 0147 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What sort of ghost story, I wonder?

data.name: 0148 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Yeah, so the one I know goes like this…

data.name: 0149 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: When night falls, the trees in the courtyard start walking all by themselves.

data.name: 0150 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I heard it in my first year though, so it's been a while.

data.name: 0151 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: But man, trees walking on their own—like how cliché can you get, y'know?

data.name: 0152 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not at all, that's exactly the sort of thing Haruhi would like.

data.name: 0153 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So please stop giving her ideas.

data.name: 0156 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Gotcha. The trees in the courtyard at night… Hmm…

data.name: 0157 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: See?

data.name: 0158 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's got the face of a child who just found a mysterious cave in the mountains.

data.name: 0159 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: By the looks of it, she's seriously considering staying here overnight.

data.name: 0160 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: What do you think?

data.name: 0161 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: It's been hot and humid lately, but I feel like it's been getting a little cooler?

data.name: 0162 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief. Her cheerfulness knows no bounds.

data.name: 0163 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If something really happened right before her eyes, would she just casually laugh it off?

data.name: 0165 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Oh, I almost forgot.

data.name: 0166 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Here, this.

data.name: 0167 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She handed over what looked to be a novel—a hardcover book.

data.name: 0169 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, a book? A considerably old one at that.

data.name: 0171 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hearing the word "book" caused Nagato to ever so slightly turn her head.

data.name: 0173 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Mikuru lent it to me before summer break and I haven't been able to return it.

data.name: 0174 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: I thought I might as well get that out of the way while I'm here.

data.name: 0175 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: And I had business at school anyways.

data.name: 0176 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, what kind of book is it?

data.name: 0177 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Before even finishing her sentence, Haruhi snatched away the book and began perusing it.

data.name: 0180 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi, come on.

data.name: 0181 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't go around swiping others' belongings—it's rude.

data.name: 0182 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Shut up. It's Mikuru's book anyway…

data.name: 0183 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …so you have no right to complain.

data.name: 0184 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If Mikuru herself were to, It'd be a different story, of course.

data.name: 0185 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't mind… though.

data.name: 0186 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: See, you hear that?

data.name: 0187 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi grinned at me as if to say "Well? What do you think of that?!"

data.name: 0188 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What's with that triumphant look?

data.name: 0190 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Anyway, I'm gonna head home soon I guess.

data.name: 0191 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehhh?

data.name: 0192 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: We're not going to look for monsters together?

data.name: 0193 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: Ahaha, sorry!

data.name: 0194 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: There're just a feeew things I've got to sort out first.

data.name: 0195 (391.ja) TSURUYA (鶴屋)
data.value: So then, see ya later!

data.name: 0197 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-umm, Kyon…

data.name: 0198 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I know, Asahina. You don't need to say the rest.

data.name: 0199 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but that girl you said you saw…

data.name: 0200 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: A long-haired girl that disappeared before you knew it…

data.name: 0202 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's that you two are talking about?

data.name: 0203 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Weren't you busy reading Asahina's book?

data.name: 0204 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can talk while still processing the book at the same time, you know.

data.name: 0205 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's as high-spec as always. Stop flaunting your useless abilities at me.

data.name: 0206 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, Kyon?

data.name: 0207 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're not trying to hide something from me, are you?

data.name: 0208 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I-I'm not hiding anything.

data.name: 0209 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm? Then what's the deal?

data.name: 0210 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no deal.

data.name: 0211 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I thought I saw a girl earlier, but in the end it was just a misunderstanding.

data.name: 0212 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's all there is to it.

data.name: 0213 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A misunderstanding?

data.name: 0214 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah. Exactly.

data.name: 0215 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Is that true, Mikuru?

data.name: 0216 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh?!

data.name: 0217 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Please get the story straight, Asahina!

data.name: 0218 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-it's not a lie, Suzumiya, honestly.

data.name: 0219 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That phrasing makes it sound all the more like a lie.

data.name: 0220 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm…? Hey, Yuki! Is Kyon telling the truth?

data.name: 0223 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is this really the time you'd ask Nagato for confirmation?

data.name: 0224 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way, I'm guessing she's going to back me up here.

data.name: 0225 (391.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If that's what he says, then yes.

data.name: 0226 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks for being on my side, but I'm really not sure about that response.

data.name: 0228 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Grr…

data.name: 0229 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, everyone has misunderstandings now and then.

data.name: 0230 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Setting that aside, isn't our first priority to investigate the remaining ghost stories?

data.name: 0231 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right. It's exactly as you say, Koizumi.

data.name: 0232 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But Kyon, from here on out, never withhold any information from your brigade chief.

data.name: 0233 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Got that?

data.name: 0234 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah yeah, I get it.

data.name: 0235 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, it's about time we start then.

data.name: 0236 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Start what?

data.name: 0237 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that obvious? Our next investigation of course.

data.name: 0238 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …You still want to?

data.name: 0239 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Obviously!

data.name: 0240 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Either way, it's going to be a sham just like the "man-eating classroom" was.

data.name: 0241 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We won't know that for sure unless we check it out for ourselves, right?

data.name: 0242 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even if one was fake, it's far too early to assume all the rest are too.

data.name: 0243 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well then, where are we headed?

data.name: 0244 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For starters, the music room.

data.name: 0245 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The music room… you say?

data.name: 0246 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: They could hear a piano melody coming from an empty music room.

data.name: 0247 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's how the story goes, if I recall correctly.

data.name: 0248 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I just realized something.

data.name: 0249 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Realized?

data.name: 0250 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah. Tsuruya came in here just now to return a book she borrowed from Mikuru, right?

data.name: 0251 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: While I was reading it, there was something that stood out…

data.name: 0252 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What could you possibly have realized from such a dry-looking book?

data.name: 0253 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm gonna head straight to the scene.

data.name: 0255 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm coming toooo!

data.name: 0256 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's fine, just follow my lead.

data.name: 0257 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, I know.

data.name: 0258 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How about you be my assistant for today, little sister?

data.name: 0259 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: What's an assistant?

data.name: 0260 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's an important person that helps out a detective.

data.name: 0261 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In a way, you'd be like Blue or Yellow.

data.name: 0262 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'd be Red, of course.

data.name: 0263 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't really think that works as an analogy…

data.name: 0264 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yayyy, I like Blue~

data.name: 0265 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well that works out nicely then.

data.name: 0266 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I think I'd better teach my sister to be a bit more suspicious of people.

data.name: 0267 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She especially needs to learn to pay no mind to anything Haruhi says.

data.name: 0268 (391.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then let's head for the music room!

data.name: 0269 (391.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Let's goooo!

data.name: 0272 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Off they go…

data.name: 0273 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: At this rate, we won't be able to leave Miss Suzumiya alone.

data.name: 0274 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't need to tell me that.

data.name: 0275 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In our current situation, we don't know what might happen if we leave her unattended.

data.name: 0276 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For the time being, we'd better just keep our eyes on her.

data.name: 0277 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's right.

data.name: 0278 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That reminds me, Asahina.

data.name: 0280 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes, what is it?

data.name: 0281 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That book Haruhi was just looking through— what's it about?

data.name: 0282 (391.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, this.

data.name: 0283 (391.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: W-well…

data.name: 0284 (391.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. So this is what caused Miss Suzumiya's revelation.

data.name: 0285 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The moment I read the title, I was overcome by intense dizziness.

data.name: 0286 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I could tell it was nothing more than a feeling.

data.name: 0287 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was astonished by how perfect—or rather, how awful—the timing was.

data.name: 0288 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Anyway, this is what was written on the cover in huge letters—

data.name: 0289 (391.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: #P05"The Ill-Fated Musicians"#P01

data.name: 0290 (391.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Test Option
